resources.string: Non prendiamoci in giro, \nse non lavori in quarantena,\nquando mai ti metterai in forma?

Exercise have to be executed in the time given. Try to work at the max in the seconds you have! The work is followed by a pause. The exercises below have specified the seconds of work first, and then the pause
Try to complete all repetitions given within the total time limit! You decide when to pause and how to split the workout. If you cannot finish it, best luck next time
Complete the exercises given below in the time frame given. If you cannot, means you have to train harder! Remember, no pause in between exercises, only in between sets!
Specify a work and a pause interval for each exercise. Give it all you have during the work and take your sweat break during the pause. Repeat for all sets!
Specify repetitions for each exercise and a total time for the workout. Try to finish all exercises within the limit. Manage your time to make it happen!
Specify repetitions and a work interval for each exercise. Finish the repetitions within the time frame, then pass to the next. Repeat for all sets!

There are three different types of workout you can choose. (1) TIME: every exercise has a working time and a pause time. Do your max! (2) REPS: every exercise is defined by a number of repetitions, you also have to specify a total time to finish the workout in. (3) REPTIME: every exercise is defined by a number of repetitions to do in a certain amount of seconds to specify

How many time do you want to repeat a round? Remember to also set the seconds of pause in between sets. If you chose the REPS type you have to choose a total time instead because the pauses are up to you!
